overview: From 2025-07-23 to 2025-07-24, ethereum-optimism/superchain-ops had 1 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 2 active contributors.

topPRs.title: U13 to U16 template and example task
topPRs.author: Wazabie
topPRs.body:
Adding initial files for the U13 > U16 template:

- This template designed for chains that are still on U12 and want to migrate directly to the latest upgrade level (U16) without executing each phase separately.

- Executes all intermediate upgrade steps:

U12 → U13 → U14 → U15 → U16, in sequence

- Each phase performs the necessary state changes using the appropriate OPCM version

- It currently only validates the final U16 with StandardValidatorV400 and only sets the final absolutePrestate for U16

topContributors.summary: Wazabie: Focused on significant updates to templates and example tasks, merging a large PR in ethereum-optimism/superchain-ops#1144 which involved substantial changes (+3914/-4598 lines). Their work primarily involved other work, with a portion dedicated to tests.

AmadiMichael: Focused on an open pull request in `ethereum-optimism/optimism` (#16798) to remove a proxyAdmin input from the OpChainConfig struct, indicating work on configuration and testing. Their contributions involved modifying 12 files with changes primarily in config and test files.
